issue.title: www.dm5.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.dm5.com/bookmarker/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dm5.com%2Fbookmarker%2F) ### Comment > 再使用GOOGLE瀏覽器時，將某個網站列入允許清單後，在同一分頁直接去往其他網頁還是會處於允許狀態(過濾器未啟用)，這個方法可以透過開啟新分頁解決，但我想大部分沒有發現問題的用戶會受害。 Username: `@只是想解決問題` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/9nj4jf1qygowgg84ok4o8skogcscw4glhyekord5og.png?nc=1)

AdGuard Base Other extensions used: | 沒有

issue.title: www.crosswordsolver.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body: I just added tinyShield userscript v1.3.61 as suggested by Adguard, but the issue remains.

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?

issue.title: devuploads.com: site breakage/anti adblock

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9.13

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website, Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://devuploads.com/8dbqsg2wcglh

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block third-party Authorization header, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Protect from DPI, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

cant download files without disabling adguard app completely. i tried at first to just add the site to my allow list. that does nothing it still detects adguard. i get a totally different screen that shows me the download link if i disable adguard. if i dont it just says checking your download and is stuck there. watch the below videos to understand.

1. Without adguard app enabled:

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/babac03c-a836-4436-81f7-f3b6f1b3ae7f


2. with adguard app enabled

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e6306ea2-657a-4040-a95f-d3e7636a9962

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
